QueryResult.text: SELECT M.MESSAGE_ID MESSAGE_ID , V.FILE_ID FILE_ID , F.NAME NAME , F.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION , F.MIME_TYPE MIME_TYPE , F.FILE_TYPE FILE_TYPE , V.BYTE_SIZE BYTE_SIZE , F.PARENT_FOLDER_ID ATTACHMENT_FOLDER_ID , M.USER_ID USER_ID FROM NTD_MESSAGES_V M, CLB_DMS_FILES F, CLB_DMS_VERSIONS V WHERE M.ATTACHMENT_FOLDER_ID = F.PARENT_FOLDER_ID AND V.FILE_ID = F.ID AND V.IS_LATEST = 1
